item.title: 317,PI,c.sendMessage
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You can try this.

public void applyDead() { c.respawnTimer = 15; c.isDead = false; if(c.duelStatus != 6) { //c.killerId = c.getCombat().getKillerId(c.playerId); c.killerId = findKiller(); Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId]; if(o != null) { if (c.killerId != c.playerId) { String[] Win = { "You have killed " + c.playerName + ".", c.playerName + " has fallen to your feet", "You have defeated the weak " + c.playerName + "." }; String[] Loss = { "You have been killed by " + o.playerName + ".", o.playerName + " has owned you.", "You have fallen to the feet of " + o.playerName + "." }; java.util.Random random = new java.util.Random(); o.sendMessage(Win[Messages.nextInt(Win.length)]); c.sendMessage(Loss[Messages.nextInt(Loss.length)]); o.pcPoints += 1; c.playerKilled = c.playerId; if(o.duelStatus == 5) { o.duelStatus++; } } } c.faceUpdate(0); c.npcIndex = 0; c.playerIndex = 0; c.stopMovement(); if(c.duelStatus <= 4) { c.sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); } else if(c.duelStatus != 6) { c.sendMessage("You have lost the duel!"); } resetDamageDone(); c.specAmount = 10; c.getItems().addSpecialBar(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]); c.lastVeng = 0; c.vengOn = false; resetFollowers(); c.attackTimer = 10; }

Read full topic

item.title: 317,PI,c.sendMessage
item.dc:creator: @Ineverbow Ineverbow
item.description:
@Ineverbow wrote:

k,whenever im having this code - no erros
where exactly should the code what im adding be?

[code] public void applyDead() {
c.respawnTimer = 15;
c.isDead = false;

	if(c.duelStatus != 6) {
		//c.killerId = c.getCombat().getKillerId(c.playerId);
		c.killerId = findKiller();
		Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId];
		if(o != null) {
			if (c.killerId != c.playerId)
			c.sendMessage("You have killed c.playerID");
			o.pcPoints += 1;
			c.playerKilled = c.playerId;
			if(o.duelStatus == 5) {
				o.duelStatus++;
			}
		}
	}
	c.faceUpdate(0);
	c.npcIndex = 0;
	c.playerIndex = 0;
	c.stopMovement();
	if(c.duelStatus <= 4) {
		c.sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!");
	} else if(c.duelStatus != 6) {
		c.sendMessage("You have lost the duel!");
	}
	resetDamageDone();
	c.specAmount = 10;
	c.getItems().addSpecialBar(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]);
	c.lastVeng = 0;
	c.vengOn = false;
	resetFollowers();
	c.attackTimer = 10;
}[/code]

Read full topic

	c.faceUpdate(0);
	c.npcIndex = 0;
	c.playerIndex = 0;
	c.stopMovement();
	if(c.duelStatus <= 4) {

	resetDamageDone();
	c.specAmount = 10;
	c.getItems().addSpecialBar(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]);
	c.lastVeng = 0;
	c.vengOn = false;
	resetFollowers();
	c.attackTimer = 10;
}[/code]
